attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why should photographers get arrested and/or camera and/or equipment seized if they are thought to be of a ''Terrorist Organization''. 
And To be allowed to take pictures in public without the police thinking its a voyeurism act.
To be allowed to ''Freely'' walk around in the public with a camera and be allowed to photograph anything but children unless their face is clearly not visible and is only a silouhette.

rejection.details:
There are a number of petitions on this subject already:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/MediaRights/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Photogrpahy/
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/filmpolice/

Kind Regards

E-Petitions Team
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
